Name: Shooting Covid
About the game: Bella's mission to restore hope and hunting for a vaccine is risky. She cannot do this on her own. So, she needs the best sidekick, you. Grab your gun, and let's rock and roll. About Shooting Covid! Shooting Covid! is a Virus Shooting Game, single-player. Let's take one's place of Bella and blast the viruses! Features: An unlimited shooting game. There are several bullets in your hand. Hunting the viruses to collect items and trade them at the front gate to discover your next adventure. Save the world. Kill the boss and stop spreading the viruses and searching for a vaccine. Don't forget to collect the snacks along the way. You may need them. Caution! Watch your step, Infected Area!
